DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , block randomize , parallel-arm , placebo-controlled , eight-week study . Initially 77 apparently healthy volunteer recruit participate study . 62 volunteer enrol study assign either MM group ( n = 32 ) placebo group ( n = 30 ) use stratify randomization guarantee comparability age , sex BMI distribution two group . The randomization code prepared staff member involve run trial , use computer-generated random number . At initiation study , subject receive 5 bottle ( 0.5L ) MM placebo , make indistinguishable identical packaging . At 4 week subject receive 5 bottle . The subject ask consume 80mL per day , preferably meal . The dose chosen base commercially recommended level . At visit , remain volume supplement count research coordinator . The subject exclude analysis consume < 80 % recommend dose .
